body_html: @ed-alertedh I also get that error log message when I create the first session with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=-1, but at least for me the code still works fine. If you want, you can filter out log messages up to error level (leaving only fatal messages) setting the environment variable TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL=3 before loading TensorFlow.
body_text: @ed-alertedh I also get that error log message when I create the first session with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=-1, but at least for me the code still works fine. If you want, you can filter out log messages up to error level (leaving only fatal messages) setting the environment variable TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL=3 before loading TensorFlow.
body: @ed-alertedh I also get that error log message when I create the first session with `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=-1`, but at least for me the code still works fine. If you want, you can filter out log messages up to error level (leaving only fatal messages) setting the environment variable `TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL=3` before loading TensorFlow.
